Case Study — Server Ops

A short walkthrough of the approach used for a high-traffic community.

Challenge

Spam and onboarding friction made retention hard. Moderation was manual and slow.

Approach

  • Automated onboarding + verification to reduce bots.
  • Built admin dashboards and small moderation scripts.
  • Designed weekly events and micro-campaigns to boost DAU.
  • Created branded assets and collabs to increase organic invites.

Impact

Spam reduced ~82%, DAU +38% quarter-on-quarter, and event participation rose significantly.
